data.title: Arctic: Our Frozen Planet
data.meta_description: Arctic: Our Frozen Planet is an epic 3D adventure across the magical realm of snow and ice at the top of our planet.  For millennia, its steady seasons have allowed life to thrive.  But global warming is upsetting this balance, and scientists are discovering that what happens here, affects us all.
data.text: Arctic: Our Frozen Planet is an epic 3D adventure across the magical realm of snow and ice at the top of our planet. For millennia, its steady seasons have allowed life to thrive. But global warming is upsetting this balance, and scientists are discovering that what happens here, affects us all.
